text: Channel Management: you can now assign Managers as delegates to add/remove Members and manage Channel descriptions.
External Link: Receivers of a shared link can now Download and Upload large Folders remotely without a Sharekey account, making the link a two-way send link for both Files & Folders.
External Link: you can now also set a shared link as "View-only", preventing downloads of Images, Videos, PDFs and Folders.
Company Tab: added Company logo and number of Employees using Sharekey (Desktop app only).
Image Viewer: added Zoom In/Out functionality for Images.
Bug Fixes & Improvements have been made to enhance your experience.
